revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Seagate |model=GoFlex |revision=Home |asin=B003SU4BXQ |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=10/2010 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=29F2G08AAD |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16DG-AC |expansion_if_types=SATA, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1.5/2A, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;2;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;1;,,, 16V/4A 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8708EN;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Cloud Engines; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22.18;Axentra HipServ OS; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=stxadmin |oui_eth=00:10:75 }} [http://www.seagate.com/external-hard-drives/desktop-hard-drives/goflex-home/ Product page]
"EHDUL4 7D28UL44001R1" and "REV.01" are silkscreened on the board.
[http://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/seagate-goflex-home ''Run Linux on the GoFlex Home'']
===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Marvell]] Kirkwood @1.2GHz :Architecture: ARMv5te *RAM: 128MB (DDR2-800) *Flash: 256MB (NAND) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 *SATA: 1x SATA *LAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) <small> :The GoFlex Home [[Property:Is a|is a]] device based on the [[Marvell]] Sheeva plug computer platform, ::and is the successor to the [[Seagate Dockstar|DockStar]] and sister device to the GoFlex Net. :Unlike the GoFlex Net, the GoFlex Home comes with a single SATA connection ::used by either a 1, 2, or 3 TB hard drive that comes with the device. </small>
==Images== <gallery> File:Seagate GoFlex Home Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Seagate GoFlex Home Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
__NOTOC__
